info_player_start.description: The starting point for a player in a single player game.

properties.target: Target to fire when the player spawns.

worldspawn.description: The world entity. Only one per map. Contains map-global properties.

properties.message: Text to display when entering the level.

properties.style: Light style index (0-31) for flickering patterns.

properties.wait: Time in seconds to wait before returning (default 3, -1 = never return).

func_button.description: A button that can be activated by the player.

properties.target: Name of the entity to trigger.
properties.health: If non-zero, button must be shot to activate.

trigger_multiple.description: A trigger volume that can be activated multiple times.

properties.target: Name of the entity to trigger.

misc_teleporter.description: Teleports the player to a target destination.

properties.target: Name of the target_teleporter entity destination.
